net.bubbaland.trivia

Class Round

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bubbaland.trivia.Round
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Round
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A data structure for rounds. The Round class contains a number of fields with parameters for the round. There is also an array of Questions that holds data for the individual questions in the round, and a list of Answers that contain the submitted answers for this round.
    Author:
    Walter Kolczynski
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
